title: SiloCityPages
description: SiloCityPages is a lightning-fast, zero-configuration static site generator from SiloCityLabs. It's built with Bootstrap, React, and Next.js, making it ideal for creating sleek documentation sites that deploy effortlessly to GitHub Pages.
label: Open Source

title: COD RCG
description: COD RCG is a fan-made Call of Duty utility for loadout generation, Warzone drop locations, and a detailed info hub for weapons, perks, and more across various CoD titles.
label: Concept Project

title: FilaMeter
description: FilaMeter is a local-first, open-source filament inventory manager for 3D printing, helping makers track and optimize usage without logins.
label: Concept Project
